data.name: The Reaper
data.detailed_description:
About the game
The 4th Horseman of the apocolapse has unleashed hell on earth. It's down to you to clean up the mess. The Reaper is an action packed VR looter shooter roguelike horror with full freedom of movement and immersive AAA quality visuals.

Key Features
  • Full freedom of movement
  • Open World Environment
  • Realistic VR environment
  • Creepy as hell itself
  • Vast array of brutal weaponry
  • Limb dismemberment and decapitation
  • Fast paced intense action
  • Jesus radar

Weapons
While you start off the game with only your trusty revolver, you will soon discover new weapons along the way that can be collected and added to your arsenal. But choose wisely and tactically which weapons you decide to pick up and remember where you left them.

Control Scheme
Promising full freedom of movement (no teleporting!) The Reaper is a single-player first-person VR shooter which allows you to explore the environment however you choose. The game uses motion controllers and its highly recommended to remain seated while playing to avoid nausea and collateral damage. Players have been known to flip their chairs backwards onto the floor in panic....so be warned!

Replayability
The game is designed to offer an arcade style experience with a high level of replayability. Spawn points and pathways will change on each play meaning no two games will be identical. The game has a full weather system and day night cycle which will change randomly with each game start. The game will adjust it's difficulty on the fly to meet your skill level. The game contains many hidden Easter eggs which are triggered to appear on certain days of the year. Don't play late at night though....or risk finding yourself in Midnight Madness Mode!

Hardware Requirements
The game is currently designed for Oculus Rift. Oculus Touch controllers required. Minimum spec graphics card is Nvidia GeForce GTX1080. Please ensure you meet the necessary hardware specs before purchase. Other VR platforms will be supported in time.

Health Warning
Please DO NOT play The Reaper if you suffer from any health issues or are pregnant. This is a very intense experience and may contain jump scares. Not for the faint hearted!
